Type of weapon sight
When multiple friendlies choose to respawn in the same location, they are combined into a cluster spawn, which lets them respawn faster
Emotional damage!
If a player has 10hp left and you hit them with a 130 damage Rail Gun headshot, the player earns 120 overkill points
Hitting a player directly with an explosive projectile

A Disruptor is a deployable with a tripwire. When an enemy runs into the tripwire they move slowly and take a bit of damage. If a friendly kills an enemy while they're slowed down, the owner of the Disruptor gets Disruptor Assist points
Shooting another player in the head
When a players health is reduced from 100 to 0, they are killed
When a player gets 3 kills in a row without dying, they are on a kill streak
Killing the enemy VIP. VIP stands for very important person
Defending a VIP from enemy players. VIP stands for very important person
Shooting an enemy Scanner and destroying it. A Scanner is a device that floats through the air and reveals the position of enemies through walls.
If a friendly kills an enemy that was revealed by your Scanner, you get Scanner Assist points
Shooting an enemy C4 and destroying it. C4 is an explosive deployable
Shooting an enemy Disruptor and destroying it
When you kill an enemy that recently killed a friendly, i.e. you 'avenged' your team mate
To capture a flag you must infiltrate the enemy base, steal their flag and return it to your base. The Flag in this game is a canister containing valuable Soltrium
When you steal a flag and carry it to your base, you earn points based on the distance you carry it
When you intercept the enemy and return your stolen flag back to your base
If you are near the enemy flag and kill an enemy, you earn points for attacking the flag
If you are near your friendly flag and kill an enemy, you earn points for defending your flag
If a friendly has stolen the enemy flag and you are near that friendly, you are escorting the flag
Killing an enemy that is carrying your flag
When you pick up a bomb and place it in the enemy base
When you pick up a bomb and carry it on your back
When you find an enemy bomb and defuse it so it doesn't explode
If you are near the enemy's bomb and kill an enemy, you earn points for attacking the bomb
If you are near your friendly bomv and kill an enemy, you earn points for defending your bomb
If a friendly has picked up a bomb and you are near that friendly, you are escorting the bomb
Killing an enemy that is carrying a bomb
If you see an enemy and press a keybind to spot them, a UI marker is placed on that enemy for your team to see. If a friendly then kills that enemy, you earn spot assist points
If you kill an enemy when inside an enemy-controlled zone, you earn attacking points
If you kill an enemy when inside a friendly-controlled zone, you earn defending points
If you are inside an enemy-controlled zone and are capturing it for your team, you are contesting the zone
When you capture an enemy-controlled zone
When you pick up lost Soltrium for your team, you are salvaging it
When your team wins a round in the Arena
When your team wins a round in the Arena and you are alive
If you shoot an enemy once and a friendly kills them, you earn assist points
If you deal 80 or more damage to an enemy, and then a friendly kills them, you earn a kill rather than an assist
If you place blocks inside a zone controlled by your team, you earn fortifying points
The player who earned the most points on their team
The player who killed the most enemies
The player who has the most headshot kills

phrase: A shadow market has developed at the outskirts of the galaxy where Soltrium is wagered. It's all or nothing in the arena where contestants fight for profit and survival.
comment: [Gamemode Info] Arena gamemode description
translation: Μια σκιώδης αγορά έχει αναπτυχθεί στα περίχωρα του γαλαξία όπου στοιχηματίζεται το σολτρίου. είναι όλα ή τίποτα στην αρένα όπου οι διαγωνιζόμενοι παλεύουν για κέρδος και επιβίωση.

phrase: Start with nothing and collect weapons to eliminate the enemy team.
comment: [Gamemode Info] [Description] [Spire]
translation: Ξεκινήστε με το τίποτα και συλλέξτε όπλα για να εξαλείψετε την ομάδα του εχθρού.

phrase: All players start with the same randomised loadout.
comment: [Gamemode Info] [Description] [Static]
translation: Όλοι οι παίκτες ξεκινούν με το ίδιο τυχαίο φορτίο.

translation: Ελέγξτε τη ζώνη για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Get two kills with every weapon, then melee to win
comment: [Gamemode Info] [Win Requirement] [Gun Game]
translation: Πάρτε δύο δολοφονίες με κάθε όπλο και στη συνέχεια κάντε μάχη για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Hold the most Soltrium to win
comment: [Gamemode Info] [Win Requirement] [Head Hunter]
translation: Κρατήστε το περισσότερο σολτρίμ για να κερδίσετε

phrase: Weapons and Mods spawn around the map
comment: [Gamemode Info] [Description] [Head Hunter]
translation: Όπλα και mods γεννιούνται γύρω από το χάρτη

phrase: Here you can customise how the points you earn in-game will display. Primary points are placed at the top of the point stack, and secondary points are placed at the bottom of the point stack.
comment: [Settings Header Title] This is a summary about how the points UI customisation works
translation: Εδώ μπορείτε να προσαρμόσετε τον τρόπο εμφάνισης των πόντων που κερδίζετε στο παιχνίδι. Τα πρωτεύοντα σημεία τοποθετούνται στην κορυφή της στοίβας σημείων και τα δευτερεύοντα σημεία στο κάτω μέρος της στοίβας σημείων.

phrase: The server name will not be displayed on the scoreboard and other player names and levels will be randomised for you.
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Το όνομα του διακομιστή δεν θα εμφανίζεται στον πίνακα αποτελεσμάτων και άλλα ονόματα και επίπεδα παικτών θα είναι τυχαία για εσάς.

phrase: Particles are produced when objects are hit or destroyed. Lowering this percentage will increase FPS
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Τα σωματίδια παράγονται όταν αντικείμενα χτυπιούνται ή καταστρέφονται. η μείωση αυτού του ποσοστού θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: The map is divided into chunks of 32x32x32 blocks. Reducing this will increase FPS
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Ο χάρτης χωρίζεται σε κομμάτια μπλοκ 32x32x32. η μείωση αυτού θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: The world is illuminated by sun lights, block lights and muzzle flashes from guns. Reducing the maximum amount of lights that can be rendered will increase FPS
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Ο κόσμος φωτίζεται από ηλιακά φώτα, φώτα μπλοκ και λάμψεις ρύγχους από όπλα. η μείωση της μέγιστης ποσότητας φώτων που μπορούν να αποδοθούν θα αυξήσει το FPS

phrase: Frames per Second (FPS) is the amount of times the game will update each second. Lowering this value will decrease CPU and GPU usage
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Frames per second (FPS) είναι ο αριθμός των φορών που το παιχνίδι θα ενημερώνει κάθε δευτερόλεπτο. Η μείωση αυτής της τιμής θα μειώσει τη χρήση CPU και GPU

phrase: Controls whether Disruptors, C4, Scanners and Canisters cast shadows
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Ελέγχει εάν οι διακόπτες, το c4, οι σαρωτές και τα δοχεία δημιουργούν σκιές

comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Ελέγχει εάν τα σωματίδια δημιουργούν σκιές

phrase: Vertical sync matches the update rate of the game to the refresh rate of your monitor. Enabling this may fix screen tearing
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Ο κάθετος συγχρονισμός ταιριάζει με το ρυθμό ενημέρωσης του παιχνιδιού με τον ρυθμό ανανέωσης της οθόνης σας. ενεργοποιώντας αυτό μπορεί να διορθώσει το σχίσιμο της οθόνης

phrase: Increasing this will improve the quality of Ambient Occlusion postprocessing
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Αυξάνοντας αυτό θα βελτιωθεί η ποιότητα της μετεπεξεργασίας περιβάλλοντος αποκλεισμού

phrase: Automatically pause the game when you change to another window
comment: [Tooltip]
translation: Αυτόματη παύση του παιχνιδιού όταν αλλάξετε σε άλλο παράθυρο

phrase: Replace swear words in chat messages with delicious food
comment: [Setting] [Tooltip]
translation: Αντικαταστήστε τις βρισιές στα μηνύματα συνομιλίας με νόστιμο φαγητό
